docs.title: 👋 Hello, I'm Martin Ward
docs.text:
Welcome to my personal portfolio!

I'm a CS student passionate about software development, AI, and building cool things on the web.

Use the tabs above to explore my work, skills, and how to contact me.

docs.title: 👨‍💻 About Me
docs.text:
I'm a Computer Science student who loves:

  • Building full-stack web apps
  • Automating tasks with Python
  • Exploring AI and data science
  • Contributing to open-source projects

In my free time, I enjoy hacking on personal projects and learning new technologies.

docs.title: 📫 Contact
docs.text:
• Email: martin.ward@example.com
  • GitHub: @martin-jerry-ward
  • LinkedIn: Your LinkedIn

Feel free to connect or reach out about internships, projects, or collaborations!

docs.title: 🎮 Space Invaders Clone
docs.text: Tech: Python + Pygame A retro-style arcade shooter built from scratch.

docs.title: 📊 Academic Tracker
docs.text: Tech: Flask, SQLite A student dashboard to visualize and track grades.

docs.title: 🌐 This Portfolio Website
docs.text: Tech: MkDocs + Material + GitHub Pages A clean, fast, and responsive site to showcase my work.
